Summary: dark appeared black boomerang object with round edges
divs: sighting detailsdriving toward apple valley on hesperia rd as a passenger. noticed a dark boomerang like object in the north\east sky, above green tree liqueur. struck me really strange, because it was coming toward hesperia rd, before it could turn around and go east i took 1 bad cell phone picture of the object. the sun was in the way for the picture but you can make it out if you look. i actually took 3 pictures only 1 shows anything. as we rounded the mountain which is highway 18 it was gone, but there was a helicopter buzzing around where it had been.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around April 26th 2013
